channel.title: [317] Moving home from edge to yannile
channel.description:
I tried to do this with my team of coders but we reached some complications that we couldn't pass.
How can I move the home location? I looked and there are no other tuts about it.. there are no ::home commands in the client. We are using the Magic Book Tele to varock(Edgeville).
i understood that I have to go in the clicking most and find the coords from the spell. But there is another problem here... Everytime some1 teleports, he/she arrives in a different place. For instance:
X coords: 3056 3057 3057 y coords: 4567 4567 4566
Any help is appreciated!

item.title: [317] Moving home from edge to yannile
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

vovchik30:

i have the same problem i cant change the home tele right now its edgville i moved all the npcs and portals to catherby cuz i want that to be my new home but i cant change the home tele.i lloked every were in mage handler palyer.java and client.jave i did ctr+f and searched home but it wasnt there help plaese if can

action button packet

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Moving home from edge to yannile
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

toX = 3087+misc.random(3); toY = 3495+misc.random(3);

toX = 3087; toY = 3495;

change to that it will only go to those coords now

Read full topic
item.source: [317] Moving home from edge to yannile

item.title: [317] Moving home from edge to yannile
item.dc:creator: @daved daved
item.description:
@daved wrote:

Well, you don’t understand that the coords modify everytime some1 telports to home? that’s why i can’t find the actual coords and change them to yannile one’s[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 26, 2009, 02:41:59 pm[/size][hr]Oo look Now I got it!

// initial x and y coordinates of the player heightLevel = 0; // the first call to updateThisPlayerMovement() will craft the proper // initialization packet toX = 3087+misc.random(3); toY = 3495+misc.random(3); [br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 26, 2009, 02:50:12 pm[/size][hr]Now I only need to modify the mage book… But I can’t find the code… or the coords.

I have both clickingmost and magic handler.

Read full topic
